trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref uid="langword_csharp_try" name="try" href=""></xref> block with any number of <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> clauses and, optionally, a <xref uid="langword_csharp_finally" name="finally" href=""></xref> block.
trans-unit.target: Representa um <xref uid="langword_csharp_try" name="try" href=""> </xref> blocos com qualquer número de <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""> </xref> cláusulas e, opcionalmente, um <xref uid="langword_csharp_finally" name="finally" href=""> </xref> bloco.

trans-unit.source: CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement can be used to represent a `try/``catch` block of code.
trans-unit.target: CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement pode ser usado para representar um `try/``catch` bloco de código.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.TryStatements%2A> property contains the statements to execute within a `try` block.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.TryStatements%2A>propriedade contém as instruções para executar dentro de um `try` bloco.</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.TryStatements%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.CatchClauses%2A> property contains the `catch` clauses to handle caught exceptions.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.CatchClauses%2A>propriedade contém o `catch` cláusulas para lidar com exceções capturadas.</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.CatchClauses%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.FinallyStatements%2A> property contains the statements to execute within a `finally` block.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.FinallyStatements%2A>propriedade contém as instruções para executar dentro de um `finally` bloco.</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.FinallyStatements%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Not all languages support `try/catch` blocks.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Nem todos os idiomas oferecem suporte a `try/catch` blocos.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A> method with the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport?displayProperty=fullName> flag to determine whether a code generator supports `try/catch` blocks.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A>método com o <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport?displayProperty=fullName>Sinalizador para determinar se um gerador de código oferece suporte a `try/catch` blocos.</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement"></xref> class using the specified statements for try and catch clauses.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement"> </xref> classe usando as instruções especificadas para try e catch cláusulas.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> objects that indicate the statements to try.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref> objetos que indicam as instruções para experimentar.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause"></xref> objects that indicate the clauses to catch.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause"> </xref> objetos que indicam as cláusulas catch.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement"></xref> class using the specified statements for try, catch clauses, and finally statements.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement"> </xref> classe usando as instruções especificadas para try, catch cláusulas e, finalmente, instruções.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> objects that indicate the statements to try.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref> objetos que indicam as instruções para experimentar.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause"></xref> objects that indicate the clauses to catch.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause"> </xref> objetos que indicam as cláusulas catch.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> objects that indicate the finally statements to use.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref> objetos que indicam o Finally para usar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the catch clauses to use.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as cláusulas catch para usar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClauseCollection"></xref> that indicates the catch clauses to use.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClauseCollection"> </xref> que indica as cláusulas catch para usar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the finally statements to use.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o Finally para usar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection"></xref> that indicates the finally statements.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection"> </xref> que indica as instruções finally.

trans-unit.source: Gets the statements to try.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as instruções para experimentar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection"></xref> that indicates the statements to try.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection"> </xref> que indica as instruções para experimentar.
